title: 07/06/2021 - Best of The Herd
itunes:title: 07/06/2021 - Best of The Herd
description:
Colin says we don't give ourselves enough time to be alone, Aaron Rodgers is doing just that to get his mind right. The NBA Finals starts tonight and just like the ending of Sopranos, Chris Paul has ambiguity, he's not like your normal star player. This upcoming NFL season in Green Bay is going to look a lot like Kevin Durant's last year in Golden State. Plus, Colin gives you his Top 10 players in the NBA Finals!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
